Material for a introductory 1-week course in Data Science, taught at the University of Regensburg.

-   Day 1: Getting started with R and descriptive statistics

-   Day 2: Graphics and statistical inference

-   Day 3: Hypthesis testing and linear regression (simple, multiple)

-   Day 4: Generalised linear models (GLM) and multivariate statistics

-   Day 5: Data science skills, data analysis projects workflow, and predictive modeling

Link to the UR GRIPS course [here](https://elearning.uni-regensburg.de/course/view.php?id=54766) (requires UR account)
